newsitem.title: USA: GSE Systems says CFO Suchniak is leaving.
newsitem.headline: GSE Systems says CFO Suchniak is leaving.

text.p: GSE Systems Inc said on Thursday that chief financial officer David Suchniak would be leaving the company as part of a restructuring announced on May 7.
In addition, GSE said Michael Cromwell III, the current vice chairman, will assume responsibility for the company's financial and administrative functions.
Frank Hanou, vice president of corporate marketing, will also leave the company, GSE said.
"By implementing these necessary reductions in personnel, we believe we'll return the company to profitability in the near future," said Jerome Feldman, chairman of the board.
GSE Systems develops business and technology solutions for the energy and manufacturing industries.
